import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Container,AppBar,Typography,Grid,Grow} from "@material-ui/core" import memories from "./images/memories.png" import Form from './components/Form/Form' import Posts from './components/Posts/Posts' import useStyle from "./styles.js" import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { getPosts } from './actions/posts' const App = () => { const [currentId,setCurrentId] = useState() const classes = useStyle(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPosts()) }, [dispatch]); return ( Memories
) } export default App
